name: skyscape
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a view of the sky over an area, or a work of art that represents this: Your first impression as you fly into Toronto is of the stunning skyscape. I tried to describe these wonderful hills and the vast skyscapes and panoramic views seen from their summits. Most of her paintings were large landscapes and skyscapes.
More examplesFewer examplesA thunderstorm passed through the area, leaving a dramatic skyscape in its wake.Some of the windows of the museum frame the New York City streetscapes and skyscapes. He felt the building was an eyesore blocking the city's beautiful skyscape.He painted skyscapes showcasing the F4 Phantom Jet and other aircraft. The set designer has created a skyscape with a gigantic moon and black clouds that move across the stage.
